alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 10:17PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LEA...NORTHWESTERN ECTOR...ANDREWS...GAINES...NORTHERN WINKLER...NORTHWESTERN MARTIN... WESTERN DAWSON AND NORTHEASTERN LOVING COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM CDT/1115 PM MDT/... At 1117 PM CDT/1017 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Seagraves to 9 miles southwest of Jal. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Andrews, Seminole, Kermit, Eunice, Seagraves, Jal, Goldsmith, Seagraves Airport, Jal Airport, Gaines County Airport, Welch, Loop, Florey, Punkin Center, McKenzie Lake, Notrees, Bennett, Frankel City, Paynes Corner, and Gaines County Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
